Zip Shine!
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Library: Fan Fiction, Poetry, Birthday List, Links & Non-Fiction Archive: Filk Songs: Zip Shine!
By Icelord13 on Wednesday, January 14, 2004 - 06:15 pm:

To the tune of "Splish Splash" copyright Bobby Darin "Splish Splash" CD Release Jan. 12, 1997 Warner

Zip Shine!

Zip Shine, I was moopin up the shrine
Long about a Saturday night
The news mews, just listenin to some tunes
Thinking everything was alright
Well, Cesare started screamin, I wondered what for
I though I only slipped but I had hit something more
And with a, zip shine, I left a monster in the shrine
Well how was I to know there was unlockin goin on?
I was a master an a blaster, trainer an a gainer,
Dealer an a healer, yeah!
Bing Bang, I saw the whole thang
A mew in the middle of the room
Flip flop, I put down the mop
It came to life after the boom
I knew my mom would like it, and my sister too!
Good Golly, said Cesare that’s a really cute mew
A-well-a, Zip Shine, mew and I left the shrine
I went an put my ranchin clothes on
I was a master an a blaster, trainer an a gainer,
Dealer an a healer, yeah!
Yes, I was a trainin an a gainin
Mew was a workin an a smirkin
We were a winnin an a grinnin
We was a earnin an a burnin
Movin with improvin
Zip Shine, YEAH!!!

Hope you liked it! -Icelord13
